ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Kit ... The otter bot sighs as she plods along in beast mode, through the jungle. Somewhere she could smell the scent of battle.. mech-fluid, burnt ground, gun

Kit 
-----

The otter bot sighs as she plods along in beast mode, through the jungle. Somewhere she could smell the scent of battle.. mech-fluid, burnt ground, gun fumes. But the wind was playing around, changing direction. It annoyed her.

It was beginning to get dark, so she searched around by a lake, and found a suitable little cave for her to sleep in for the night.
